data.title: Georgia Forestry Commission
data.meta_description: Careers at GFC GFC seeks to recruit highly qualified technical, administrative and managerial personnel. We offer challenging work, training opportunities, attractive employee benefits and a pay for performance compensation plan. Current Job Openings Please check our Current Job Openings to see if there is an available position that fits your skills and interests. We update
data.text:
GFC employs part time and full time dispatchers. Part time dispatcher applications are accepted on an ongoing basis.

Examples of duties:

Support of fire control activities under limited supervision

Operate and monitor a voice and data communications system consisting of: two-way radio, telephone and computer data communications network

Assist in location, dispatching of equipment and maintaining radio contact with personnel

Stay abreast of current fire information and issue weather updates

Receive and process burn permits

Perform related clerical work including completion of reports and answering/forwarding incoming telephone calls

Perform minor janitorial duties within the dispatch work area

We are always accepting applications! Click here the State of Georgia Application.
